message.text: Thanks to you both for volunteering. Here's some details on the request. Let's help some neighbors!
message.reminder: _*Reminder:* When you make a delivery, drop the groceries at the door, step 6 feet away, and make sure that the recipient knows to wipe down all the groceries (or wash with soap and water)_
message.outro: _*Note*: Mark this request as completed after you're done._
